channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Thousands of US hazardous sites are at risk of flooding because of sea level rise, study finds
item.description: A new study finds that thousands of hazardous sites across the U.S. are at risk of flooding due to sea level rise that could pose public health threats to neighboring communities.

item.title: More than 250 arrested in immigration crackdown across North Carolina
Multicultural New Orleans awaits arrival of ‘Swamp Sweep’ immigration crackdown
